Armor set based off of the 1999 japanese animated film [b]Jin-Roh: The Wolf Brigade.[/b]
CE 1.6 Patch added, check mod settings to switch versions.
-Craftable -Research Requirements: Fabrication
Balanced to be a tier below power armor.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ji5cL9I.png[/img]
Armor Rating: [b]0.73 Sharp / 0.33 Blunt / 0.7 Heat[/b]
Crafting Requirements: [b]Crafting Skill: 7[/b] [b]Steel x 40[/b] [b]Components x 4[/b]
CE Patch: [b]Weapon Handling +10%[/b] [b]Smoke Sensitivity -100% (CE 1.6)[/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/JaC6PjI.png[/img]
Armor Rating: [b]0.91 Sharp / 0.36 Blunt / 0.7 Heat[/b]
Crafting Requirements: [b]Crafting Skill: 8[/b] [b]Steel x 120[/b] [b]Components x 8[/b]
CE Patch: [b]Carry Weight +40 / Carry Bulk +10[/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/1ytMA2I.png[/img]
Both can be crafted at the Fabrication Table.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/jJmjUJ9.png[/img]
Click on the picture to check out the MG42 from CEC: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1862509294andsearchtext=][img]https://i.imgur.com/SI9dNBv.png[/img][/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/83vdKuU.png[/img]
[b]Inspiration[/b]: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jin-Roh:_The_Wolf_Brigade]Jin-Roh: The Wolf Brigade[/url] [b]Rimworld[/b]: [url=https://rimworldgame.com/]Tynan Sylvester, Ludeon Studios[/url] [b]Mod Creator[/b]: Pooler
[img]https://i.imgur.com/vKP0foj.png[/img] Should be compatible with most mods, as these are just apparel using vanilla values
